column2: News arrives of a great threat - in the Stonelands, to the north of Cormyr, a sworn foe of the Obarskyr dynasty has been freed from her ancient prison. Once an elf named Lorelei Alavara, she has sworn vengeance against the Obarskyrs, and taken the form of a Red Dragon, Nalavarauthatoryl. Now she raises an army of goblins and orcs, with invasion likely only days away.
This bodes ill for the kingdom...
